sentences.english: The journalists like to dish the dirt about television stars.
sentences.chinese: 記者有時喜歡揭電視明星的瘡疤。

sentences.english: After a while, Pao-yu could wait no longer, so he stepped forward and removed the veil.
sentences.chinese: 又過了一會，寶玉實在按捺不住，上前揭了蓋頭。

sentences.english: The top of this box won't lift (off).
sentences.chinese: 這個盒子的蓋揭不起來。

sentences.english: Did you see some of his poems published in the magarizonaine?
sentences.chinese: 你見過他揭櫫在雜誌的一些詩嗎？

sentences.english: My son soaks the stamp off each time when I reveive a letter.
sentences.chinese: 每次我收到信後我兒子就用水把郵票弄溼揭下來。

sentences.english: Do not use if either tamper-evident seal is broken or missing.
sentences.chinese: 如果任防揭封條破損或丟失，不要使用。

sentences.english: Easy to get it on you, extremely painful to rip from your arm hairs.
sentences.chinese: 粘上去很容易，揭下來的時候就要忍着掉毛的疼痛了。

sentences.english: She often raked up his past.
Don'trub my nose in it in front of my friends.
sentences.chinese: 不要在我朋友面前揭我的瘡疤。

sentences.english: Q. How often will overdue clubs be listed on the RI Web site?
sentences.chinese: 過期未交的社間隔多久會被揭載於國際扶輪網站上？

sentences.english: Has already apologized for his wrong doing , we don't have to rub his nose in it.
sentences.chinese: 先生已經爲他的錯誤道歉，我們不必再揭他的瘡疤。

sentences.english: When he plugged the spout of the kettle, the lid rose.
sentences.chinese: 當它把水壺的噴口塞緊時，壺蓋被揭起來了。

sentences.english: Before I open, a big brother first exposed the answer.
sentences.chinese: 沒等我開口，一位大哥先行揭了謎底。

sentences.english: Don't pick the scab or it will bleed.
sentences.chinese: 別揭那個痂，要不然會流血的。

sentences.english: Revelation induces a state in which fear has already been abolished.
sentences.chinese: 啓示則爲人揭櫫了一個恐懼已徹底消除的境界。
